text: Lapsanastrum is a genus of flowering plants in the dandelion family, native to East Asia (China, Korea, Japan).Pak, Jae Hong & Bremer, Kåre. 1995. Taxon 44(1): 19–20Tropicos, Lapsanastrum Pak & K. Bremer Flora of China Vol. 20-21 Page 263 稻槎菜属 dao cha cai shu Lapsanastrum Pak & K. Pak & K.Bremer \- Anhui, Fujian, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Japan, Korea * Lapsanastrum takasei (Sasaki) Pak & K.Bremer \- Taiwan * Lapsanastrum uncinatum (Stebbins) Pak & K.Bremer \- Anhui ==References== Category:Asteraceae genera Category:Flora of China Category:Flora of Eastern Asia Category:Cichorieae
